review: Not as many movies or shows as I thought.
author: Jennifer Roush

review: this thing is a must if you have a prime account, even if you dont, and have at least one feature of it, its still worth getting. easy to set up, set up is fast, and if you buy a movie through amazon, its ready INSTANTLY and starts playing. Great apps available for it. i had spotify connect added to this and can control spotify on my TV from my phone! great feature! all the features are great for this, easy to navigate menu's, small compact design, and most of all affordable! great product. I Highly reccomend this.

review: Honestly, if I would have known how identical the Fire Stick is to the Fire TV, I wouldn't have gotten both. 5 stars!
author: J. D. Nelson "JD Nelson"

review: Very Fast!! With A Real Remote!! I'mvery impressed with the FireStick!!
author: bwise

review: I bought this for my parents who are in their 50's and they live it. It was very easy to set up, easy to connect, and the remote is easy to use. I have a chrome cast and I am now going to get an Amazon fire tv stick instead. The chrome cast works well but can get disconnected which makes it harder to pause or stop the show you are watching. With the Amazon fire tv stick the remote control allows for quick access to change or pause your show without waiting for your phone to connect back to it like chrome cast. My parents love it and I want one.
author: Meleah Hilton

review: Great! Wish there were more. Free movies
